item.title: The Static Site Guide
item.description: This is a book about creating and publishing static websites using HTML, CSS, and the Hugo static site generator. It’s still a work in progress, but you can read the completed chapters here. Matt Cone is a technical writer at Fastly and the author of The Markdown Guide.
